ai-patthana14.6:0.2_0: (The teachings should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana14.6:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of thought.
ai-patthana14.6:2.1_4: (This should be told in full as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana14.6:2.1_5: (The following should be expanded as in SN 35.18.)
ai-patthana14.6:3.1_0: The group of six are finished.
